bibl.title: Greeting card from Estela Agramonte Rodriguez Leon to Philip Showalter Hench and Mary Hench, [December 1951]

div1.p: Rodriguez Leon had hoped to see the Hench's this winter for the award of the Finlay Medal to Hench.

div1.head: Greeting card from Estela Agramonte Rodriguez Leon to Philip Showalter Hench and Mary Hench, [December 1951]
div1.opener:
GREETINGS
Dear Dr and Mrs Hench:
div1.p:
I had hoped, when I heard the Doctor
was to receive the Finlay Medal,
that we would have the pleasure
of seeing you both this winter.
I shall always look forward
to the chance of reviewing our
most pleasant acquaintance.
My husband joins me in wish-
ing you both the best of every-
thing for 1952.
